snippet.title: AirMech Arena Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
AirMech® Arena, the ultimate free-to-play, real-time action-strategy game, is taking the battle for the future to PS4 and Xbox One!  Take control of the most versatile transforming war machine: the AirMech.  Strike by air or deliver assaults on the ground and lead your massive armies to overtake enemy fortresses. Play with up to six friends online!

Download now and learn more at AirMechArena.com
